description: Details of contaminated land investigation and risk assessment of the site pursuant to condition 1 of planning permission Ref PAN/2014/4586 dated 23/11/14 for change of use from offices (Use Class B1a) to residential (Use Class C3), consisting of 24 residential units (6 x studio flats, 13 x 1 bedroom flats and 5 x 2 bedroom flats) and 24 car parking spaces (under Class J, 56 day Prior Approval Process)
decision_conditions: The decision to grant the details application pursuant to condition 1 (Details of Contaminated land Investigation, risk assessment) of planning permission ref: PAN/2014/4586 dated 23/11/2014 has been taken having regard to the policies and proposals in the Development (Core) Strategy (2012) , Ealing Unitary Development  'Plan for the Environment' (2004) and the London Plan (2011), and to all relevant material considerations including Supplementary Planning Guidance.  Ealing Unitary Development  'Plan for the Environment' (2004) 2.7  Contaminated Land  The London Plan 2011 5.21 Contaminated Land  National Planning Policy Framework (2012)  The Council's Pollution-Technical team has assessed the submitted details and has recommended that the condition be discharged in full. It is therefore considered that the agreed remediation scheme will bring the site to a condition suitable for the intended use. Accordingly it is recommended that the application to discharge condition 1 (Details of Contaminated land Investigation, risk assessment)
